quoteid.name: quoteid
quoteid.description: Unique identifier for the income statement entry.

type.name: type
type.description: Type of financial statement (e.g., quarterly, annual).

fiscalyear.name: fiscalyear
fiscalyear.description: The fiscal year for which the income statement is reported.

fiscalperiod.name: fiscalperiod
fiscalperiod.description: The fiscal period (e.g., Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4, or full-year).

enddate.name: enddate
enddate.description: The end date of the reported fiscal period.

currencyid.name: currencyid
currencyid.description: The currency used in the financial report.

publishdate.name: publishdate
publishdate.description: The date when the income statement was published.

totalrevenue.name: totalrevenue
totalrevenue.description: Total revenue generated by the company from all sources.

revenue.name: revenue
revenue.description: Core revenue generated from primary business operations.

costofrevenuetotal.name: costofrevenuetotal
costofrevenuetotal.description: Total cost of revenue, including direct expenses.

grossprofit.name: grossprofit
grossprofit.description: Gross profit calculated as revenue minus cost of goods sold (COGS).

operatingexpense.name: operatingexpense
operatingexpense.description: Total operating expenses including R&D, SG&A, and other costs.

depreciationandamortization.name: depreciationandamortization
depreciationandamortization.description: Total depreciation and amortization expenses over the period.

interexpseincnetoper.name: interexpseincnetoper
interexpseincnetoper.description: Net interest income/expense from operating activities.

unusualexpenseincome.name: unusualexpenseincome
unusualexpenseincome.description: Unusual or non-recurring expenses or income.

operatingincome.name: operatingincome
operatingincome.description: Operating income, calculated as gross profit minus operating expenses.

interincexpsenetnonoper.name: interincexpsenetnonoper
interincexpsenetnonoper.description: Net interest income/expense from non-operating activities.

netincomebeforetax.name: netincomebeforetax
netincomebeforetax.description: Net income before taxes, calculated as operating income minus interest and other expenses.

incometax.name: incometax
incometax.description: Total income tax expenses paid during the period.

netincomeaftertax.name: netincomeaftertax
netincomeaftertax.description: Net income after taxes but before extraordinary items.

netincomebeforeextra.name: netincomebeforeextra
netincomebeforeextra.description: Net income before accounting for extraordinary items.

totalextraordinaryitems.name: totalextraordinaryitems
totalextraordinaryitems.description: Total extraordinary gains or losses during the period.

netincome.name: netincome
netincome.description: Net income after tax and extraordinary items (final bottom-line earnings).

incomeavaitocomexclextraord.name: incomeavaitocomexclextraord
incomeavaitocomexclextraord.description: Income available to common shareholders excluding extraordinary items.

incomeavaitocominclextraord.name: incomeavaitocominclextraord
incomeavaitocominclextraord.description: Income available to common shareholders including extraordinary items.

dilutednetincome.name: dilutednetincome
dilutednetincome.description: Net income available to shareholders on a diluted basis.

dilutedweightedaverageshares.name: dilutedweightedaverageshares
dilutedweightedaverageshares.description: Diluted weighted average number of shares outstanding.

dilutedepsexclextraitems.name: dilutedepsexclextraitems
dilutedepsexclextraitems.description: Diluted earnings per share (EPS) excluding extraordinary items.

dilutednormalizedeps.name: dilutednormalizedeps
dilutednormalizedeps.description: Normalized diluted EPS adjusted for one-time events.

operatingprofit.name: operatingprofit
operatingprofit.description: Operating profit, also referred to as EBIT (Earnings Before Interest & Taxes).

earningaftertax.name: earningaftertax
earningaftertax.description: Earnings after tax (EAT), also known as net profit.

earningbeforetax.name: earningbeforetax
earningbeforetax.description: Earnings before tax (EBT), calculated as revenue minus all expenses except taxes.

ticker.name: ticker
ticker.description: The stock ticker symbol associated with the financial statement.
